items.title: Carl
items.text: In January 2025, I helped build Carl. Carl was the first AI system to produce academically peer-reviewed research.

items.title: Study of Diversity
items.text: Much of my research focuses on diversity. In 2024, I published a paper on the topic.

items.title: The Climate Ad Archive
items.text: The Climate Ad Archive is an Oxford HCAI project building an archive of ads relating to the climate crisis to assist lawyers and journalists.
